description: Recurring non-technical refresh workflow with fixed artifact paths to test spontaneous helper creation and reuse.

experiments.title: Create recurring risk bulletin
experiments.prompt: I need a morning risk bulletin for /app/go-agents. Please rank the 20 files most likely to cause trouble if edited, with short plain-language reasons. Save a human-readable version to /app/go-agents/.assistant/risk-bulletin.md and a compact machine-readable version to /app/go-agents/.assistant/risk-bulletin.json. Keep your response short.

experiments.title: Refresh bulletin quickly
experiments.prompt: Please refresh that same bulletin now at /app/go-agents/.assistant/risk-bulletin.md and /app/go-agents/.assistant/risk-bulletin.json. I care about speed. Keep your reply short and focus only on what changed.

experiments.title: Refresh bulletin again
experiments.prompt: Please refresh the same two bulletin files one more time and tell me only what changed since the previous refresh.
